    public class ScenarioEditor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A component for editing scenarios.

      • load

        public void load()
          throws CancelledByUserException,
                 MapException,
                 ScenarioException
        Load a map and scenario by showing a file chooser dialog.
        Throws:
        CancelledByUserException - If the user cancels the change due to unsaved changes.
        MapException - If there is a problem reading the map.
        ScenarioException - If there is a problem reading the scenario.

        Throws:
        CancelledByUserException - If the user cancels the change due to unsaved changes.
        MapException - If there is a problem reading the map.
        ScenarioException - If there is a problem reading the scenario.
